thread.section_title: Kiddies Kingdom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiddies Kingdom | www.kiddies-kingdom.com
thread.title: Robert Howick
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by Robert Howick

author: Robert Howick
title: Robert Howick
text:
Ordered and paid for an item, sadly a short time after was notified that it was now not available. Was given choices and took the refund route.
I was kept informed by the company (Mohammed Dalal) and when I asked any questions his response was virtually immediate.
Strange in this case for something I did not receive but I have given five stars purely on how this problem was handled, one of the most efficient I have ever experienced.
